TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicDataRoute extends System.Web.Routing.Route

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 动态数据使用的路由。

span.span: Represents a route that is used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用路由配置动态数据行为。You use routes to configure Dynamic Data behavior. 类型的静态 属性 包含路由的集合。The static property of the type holds a collection of routes. 对于动态数据，通常会注册一个或多个路由 (添加到 global.asax 文件中的 `Application_Start` 事件) 。For Dynamic Data, one or more routes are typically registered (added to the property) in the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 例如，路由确定某一数据行的详细信息是否应与行列表显示在同一页上。For example, routes determine whether the details for a row of data should be shown on the same page as the list of rows. 它们还可以确定详细信息是否应与某些表（而不是其他表）的行列表显示在同一页上。They can also determine whether details should appear on the same page as the list of rows for some tables but not others. 设置 、 、 和 属性，并在构造函数中提供 URL 的模式 。You set the , , , and properties and provide a pattern for the URL in the constructor. 动态数据使用您提供的 URL 模式来匹配请求的 URL 模式和创建 Url。Dynamic Data uses the URL pattern that you provide to match URL patterns for requests and to create URLs. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: How to: Define a Route

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string url) cil managed

span.span: The pattern for the URL.

summary.span: 使用指定的 URL 模式初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified URL pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，使用替换参数指定动态数据将创建的 Url。Typically, you specify the URLs that Dynamic Data will create by using substitution parameters. 例如，如果传递字符串 "{table}/{action}"，则在使用 ListDetails 操作查看 Product 表时，结果将是 URL "~/Products/ListDetails.aspx"。For example, if you pass the string "{table}/{action}", the result would be the URL "~/Products/ListDetails.aspx" when you view the Product table by using the ListDetails action. 不需要使用替换参数。Using substitution parameters is not required. 可以传递字符串 "Table/DynamicData"，这会产生 " \~ /Table/DynamicData.aspx"。You could pass the string "Table/DynamicData", which would produce "\~/Table/DynamicData.aspx". 可以传递 "MyPageName" 以生成 " \~ /MyPageName.aspx"。You could pass "MyPageName" to produce "\~/MyPageName.aspx". 动态数据不依赖于 URL 来确定表和操作信息。Dynamic Data does not rely on the URL to determine table and action information.

summary.span: 获取或设置路由的操作名称。

The action name for a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可能的操作名称的列表，请参阅 。For a list of possible action names, see . 如果在创建实例时未设置此属性 ，则该路由将应用于所有操作。If you do not set this property when you create an instance of , the route will apply to all actions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `httpContext`参数提供所需的 Web 请求信息，以便能够识别请求的表和操作。The `httpContext` parameter provides Web request information that is required so that the requested table and action can be identified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在创建实例时未设置此属性 ，则使用已注册实例的默认模型 。If you do not set this property when you create an instance of , the default model for the registered instance is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与属性完全相同 。The property is identical to the property. 它作为属性的强类型版本提供，便于 编码。It is provided as a strongly typed version of the property for coding convenience.

summary.span: 获取或设置与路由关联的 .aspx 页的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .aspx page that is associated with a route.

value.span: 与路由关联的 .aspx 页的名称。

span.span: The name of the .aspx page that is associated with the route.

value.span: 如果没有为路由指定任何页，则此属性将返回追加了“.aspx”的 属性的值。

span.span: If no page is specified for the route, the property returns the value of the property with ".aspx" appended to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态数据使用多个标准 .aspx 页面名称创建 UI，以允许用户查看、更新和删除给定表中的数据。Dynamic data uses several standard .aspx page names to create the UI to let users view, update, and delete data from a given table. 这些页面名称包括 .aspx、Details、.aspx、default.aspx、default.aspx 和 ListDetails。These page names include List.aspx, Details.aspx, Edit.aspx, Insert.aspx, and ListDetails.aspx. 属性指定应将这些页中的哪些页用于给定的表和操作。The property specifies which of these pages should be used for a given table and action.
